summary: Recolored Alduin as a Shadow dragon from D&D.
descriptionHtml:
Next in line for a D&D recolor...the big baddie himself, Alduin! This time around, I went with my version of a Shadow dragon. Black, hints of deep blue and/or purples...and it even \'fits\' him, according to the loading screen with the Song of the Dragonborn...

\"And the Scrolls have foretold,  of [b]Black Wings[/b] in the cold, that when brothers wage war come unfurled! Alduin, Bane of Kings,  [b]ancient shadows unbound[/b],  with a hunger to swallow the world!\" -- Song of the Dragonborn

Also, if the \'wet plastic\' look bugs you as much as it did me, then I HIGHLY recommend this mod:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2254
Works wonderfully, and definitely makes Alduin look a LOT less like a toy.

So...enjoy!

This replaces the vanilla Alduin .dds file. Place in Data/Textures/Actors.

edit: added a lightened version as well. Dont use both; only one or the other.
author: LoganGFX
